Returns: the X.509 encoding of the key. Returns a new array each time this method is called.
getEncoded().Description: Returns the key bytes, encoded according to the X.509 standard.

Parameters: byte: the key, which is assumed to be encoded according to the X.509 standard. The contents of the array are copied to protect against subsequent modification.
X509EncodedKeySpec(byte[]).Description: Creates a new X509EncodedKeySpec with the given encoded key.

getFormat().Description: Returns the name of the encoding format associated with this key specification.

ClassDesc: This class represents the ASN.1 encoding of a public key, encoded according to the ASN.1 type SubjectPublicKeyInfo. The SubjectPublicKeyInfo syntax is defined in the X.509 standard as follows:
